Wisdom: إِذَا طَابَقَ الْكَلَامُ نِيَّةَ الْمُتَكَلِّمِ قَبِلَهُ السَّامِعُ وَإِذَا خَالَفَ نِيَّتَهُ لَمْ يَحْسُنْ مَوقِعُهُ مِنْ قَلْبِهِ
enWisdom: When the speech corresponds to the intention of the speaker, the listener accepts it but when it is against his intention, it does not take up a good position in his heart
Many an intention is more beneficial than action
The goodness of inward thoughts is evidence of the soundness of insight
The soundness of consciences is from the best provisions

Wisdom: عَلَى قَدْرِ النِّيَّةِ تَكُونُ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْعَطِيَّةُ
enWisdom: The grant [of reward] from Allah is proportionate to the [sincerity of] intention
